stage1.title: Pemandu Hutan
stage1.description: Mengejar 10 Seelie dan mengaktifkan Seelie Court-nya di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.

stage2.title: Pemandu Hutan
stage2.description: Mengejar 20 Seelie dan mengaktifkan Seelie Court-nya di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.

stage3.title: Pemandu Hutan
stage3.description: Mengejar 40 Seelie dan mengaktifkan Seelie Court-nya di Avidya Forest, Lokapala Jungle, Ardravi Valley, Ashavan Realm, Vissudha Field, Lost Nursery, dan Vanarana.
